trans-unit.source: Implements a type converter for <xref href="System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey"></xref> objects, which deliberately have no type conversion pathways.
The type converter enforces and reports that behavior.
The <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey> type should not use a type converter pathway to convert values.
You should use markup extensions instead.

For this reason, the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always return `false`.

The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always throw an exception.
The exceptions might possibly report invalid input, but even input that is considered valid will result in <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
XAML Text Usage
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter"></xref> class.
Determines whether an object of the specified type can be converted to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey"></xref>, using the specified context.
Always returns `false`.
The <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey> type should not use a type converter pathway to convert values (should use markup extensions instead).

For this reason, the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always return `false`.

The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always throw an exception.
A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
The type being evaluated for conversion.
`false` in all cases.
sourceType is `null`.
Determines whether an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey"></xref> can be converted to the specified type, using the specified context.
Always returns `false`.
The <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey> type should not use a type converter pathway to convert values (should use markup extensions instead).

For this reason, the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always return `false`.

The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always throw an exception.
A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
The type being evaluated for conversion.
`false` in all cases.
destinationType is `null`.
Attempts to convert the specified object to a <xref href="System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey"></xref>, using the specified context.
Throws an exception in all cases.
The <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey> type should not use a type converter pathway to convert values (should use markup extensions instead).

For this reason, the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always return `false`.

The object to convert.
Throws an exception in all cases.

Attempts to convert a <xref href="System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey"></xref> to the specified type, using the specified context.
Throws an exception in all cases.
The <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey> type should not use a type converter pathway to convert values.
You should use markup extensions instead.

For this reason, the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always return `false`.
